analitical-reasoning.question: Sum of ages of Anu and Bhanu is 10 years more than sum of ages of Bhanu, Chanu and Dhanu. Average age of Chanu and Dhanu is 19 years. Find the average age of Anu and Dhanu if Dhanu is 10 years elder than Chanu.
